ModMetaData.name: [1.0] Movable Hydroponics
ModMetaData.author: Red4StandingBy
ModMetaData.description:
(This mod has no requirements)
Makes hydroponics basins reinstallable/uninstallable.
There is a slight graphic glitch if you reinstall while it is planted, but it goes away after the first full grow cycle.
This should be safe to install or remove on an existing save.
